newsitem.title: INDONESIA: PRESS DIGEST - Indonesian newspapers - May 26.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Indonesian newspapers - May 26.

text.p: The following are the leading stories in the Indonesian press on May 26. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
At least 133 people have died after being trapped in a shopping center which was set on fire last week during a riot in the Indonesian town of Banjarmasin in South Kalimantan province.

At least 269 people died during the 27-day election campaign period ahead of the May 29 general elections. The people died either in clashes among supporters of the contesting parties or in traffic accidents.
Police have arrested six people, including a former president-director of Artha Prima Bank, for their alleged involvement in corruption related to the issuance of commercial papers and bad loans.
